parameters.name: dashboard_id
parameters.description: (string) UUID identifying the dashboard to be published.

warehouse_id.description:
Flag to indicate if the publisher's credentials should be embedded in the
published dashboard. These embedded credentials will be used to execute the
published dashboard's queries.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

403.description: Caller does not have permission to execute the specified operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.
